meanings.sent1: The limpsier dog struggled to keep up with the others.

meanings.sent3: The limpsier cat tried to chase the laser pointer but kept stumbling.
meanings.sent4: His confidence grew limpsier with each rejection.
meanings.sent5: The limpsier steps of the old man echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.sent1: The limpsier shoe was harder to walk in than the other one.
